name: Cube (itch) (MaxTopan)
description:
1, 2, 3 - Move on Z axis 
Arrow Keys  - Move on X/Y Axis
Numpad movement can be selected in the options menu.

Move to collect the blue cubes. Don't run out of time. Tell your mother that you love her.

Made in 2016 for a uni project involving creating your own controller; that controller met it's end swiftly after hand in, but the game's still perectly playable on keyboard!
